title: Katie Price's son Junior 'too embarrassed' to visit her 'mucky' mansion

Peter Andre's son Junior was too "embarrassed" to stay over at his mum Katie Price's house because it was so messy, insiders have claimed.

Despite having an excellent relationship with his mum, the 14-year-old is at that typical teenage age where every kid thinks their parents are a bit embarrassing.

And our insider claims that Junior was so put off by the mess at Katie's so-called 'mucky mansion', he'd rather be at his dad's.

Katie confirmed on Wednesday that she's not currently living in the house.

The source said: "He was so embarrassed by the mess and preferred Peter's cleaner house. He is like any teenage boy and embarrasses easily so he just didn't visit the house.

"He still saw his mum but wouldn't stay overnight because he just couldn't stand the mess.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

(Image: Instagram)

"Junior also needed to get to school and Katie not driving meant it was more difficult to get around."

At the weekend, Katie cheered on eldest son Harvey, 17, as he performed at Autism's Got Talent.

And he was joined by all of her other children, except for Junior.

Princess, 12, Jett, five, and Bunny, four, were there to support their big brother.

On an episode of Katie's reality show, My Crazy Life, Junior was once seen telling his mum off for being inappropriate.

While Katie and her then-husband Kieran Hayler were clearing out two massive containers full of old stuff, Junior wasn't keen on some of the things he heard.

As Kieran announced the container was full of "plastic" that would "have to go in the skip", Katie rubbed her body up and down, saying: "Plastic but fantastic", and Kieran squeezed her boobs.

Junior wasn't happy.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

He told his mum: "Do any parents do that in front of their children?"

Katie asked: "Junior, what's weird?"

And he sarcastically responded: "Oh, yeah, it's just normal for Kieran to go up to you and then just squeeze your boobs and go honk honk honk!"

"Well, everyone squeezes my boobs," she said in her defence.

Princess did exactly that to prove the point, but she too has felt embarrassed by her famous mum.

The youngster once hit out at her mum for "dressing like a teenager".

At the launch of her children's clothing ranges, Princess told Katie: "You wear clothes, not for your age. You wear clothes for teenagers. You wear a short top, pink slippers."

And Katie said: "They don’t even like me getting out the car when I pick them up from school.

"They get embarrassed of me even pulling up in a pink car, embarrassed when I get out.

"Junior says to me, 'My friends at school say that I’m not normal' and I say, 'That’s what people say about me. None of us are normal'."

Katie also recently gave a tour of her messy home, which has bird poo on the floor and stacks of underwear and clothes lying around everywhere.

(Image: Youtube)

(Image: Youtube)

There was also graffiti on the walls and no furniture as the property undergoes renovation by a team of builders.

In a video, Katie admitted sorting through the clutter gave her a "headache".

Katie announced in the YouTube clip that she was planning to flog all her old clothes on eBay and that she has nine garages "full of c**p".

"It's exhausting to know where to start, which room which pile," Katie said.

"I don't need these clothes and I'm always saying what can I wear? Where do I start?

"It just gives me a headache to be honest."

Mirror Online has contacted Katie and Peter's representatives for comment.
